duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain the accuracy, condition, and security of Government and Commercial inventory.
Perform daily cycle counts and investigate the causes of inventory variances.
Process material requests and support customer and organic material sourcing.
Participate in cross-functional improvement projects and provide inputs for inventory management system.
Operate within company standards for safety, security, productivity, and accuracy.
Demonstrate excellent communication and customer service skills.
Analyze internal reports and metrics to identify areas of opportunity for process improvement.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent U.S Citizenship required.
